title: Pizza
ingredients: 2 x 400g cans good-quality Italian chopped tomatoes

title: Superhealthy pizza
ingredients: each strong white and strong wholewheat flour
1 tsp or 7g sachet easy-blend dried yeast

title: Cauliflower crust pizza
ingredients: 25gGrana Padanoor Parmesan (or vegetarian alternative), grated, plus extra to serve

title: Pizza fondue dip
ingredients: garlic bread,crostini or breadsticks, to serve

title: Tortilla pizza
ingredients: ½ tspdried herbs(mixed herbs, basil or oregano work well)

title: Mozzarella stuffed crust pizza
ingredients: toppings of your choice, we used pepperoni slices, chopped chorizo and basil

title: Easy tomato pizzas
ingredients: 2 tbspextra-virgin olive oil, plus extra to serve
about 5 tbsp roast  tomato sauce(see tip below), or stir together 100ml passata and a crushed garlic clove
your choice of toppings:         goat's cheese(with rind), grated Parmesan or Parmesan shavings, handful rocket, prosciutto

title: Toddler recipe: homemade pizza with veggie faces
Crumpet pizzas
ingredients: toppings of your choice(peppers, cherry tomatoes, red onion, sweetcorn, olives, ham and basil all work well)

title: Frying pan pizza with aubergine, ricotta & mint
Cheap-as-chips veggie pizza
ingredients: pack of 5 large Middle Eastern flatbreads

title: Cheese & bacon scone pizza
ingredients: 2 tbsp tomato ketchup mixed with 2 tbsp tomato purée

title: 20-minute Fiorentina pizzas
ingredients: 2large Middle Eastern  flatbreads(if you can't get flatbreads, use ready-made pizza bases instead - tortillas are too thin for this topping and end up soggy)

title: Holiday pizzas
ingredients: ham, red peppers, black olives, salami, mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, cheddar, tuna, sweetcorn

title: Gory guts pizza tear 'n' share bread
ingredients: 250g gratedmozzarellaor cheddar, or use a mixture
pizza fillingsof your choice (we used olives and ham)

title: Pinwheel pizzas
ingredients: 1whole roasted pepper, from a jar, cut into strips

title: Simple pizza base
ingredients: 600gstrong white breadflour, plus plenty for rolling

title: Rye pizza with figs, fennel, gorgonzola & hazelnuts
Spicy prawn pizzas
ingredients: 2 tbspextra-virgin olive oil, plus a bit extra

title: Sloppy Joe pizza breads
ingredients: 350g jar tomato and chilli pasta sauce
2 x 125g balls mozzarella, drained and torn

title: Mini top-your-own pizzas
ingredients: choose your favourites (we used black olives

title: Spelt pizza bianco with Jersey Royals
Tricolore pizza with basil oil
ingredients: 175gfrom a 500g pack ciabattabread mix, plus a little extra for dusting

title: Christmas leftovers pizza
ingredients: large handful (about 100g) ofleftover stuffing(a sausage stuffing works well for this)

title: Frying pan pizza bianco with mushrooms & egg
ingredients: 2 tspoil, plus a drizzle for frying

title: Chorizo pizza with peppers & manchego
ingredients: ½quantity pizza dough(see recipe in 'goes well with', right), divided into 2 balls

title: Four seasons pizza
ingredients: mozzarellaand/or cheddar, olives, pepperoni, anchovies, basil, ham, rocket, sweetcorn, mushrooms, peppers, courgettes, cherry tomatoes- or choose your own

title: Pizza toast
ingredients: 2soda farls, split lengthways, then cut in half to make 4 slices

title: Sicilian pizza (sfincione)
ingredients: 2pork sausages, preferably fennel-flavoured, skins removed then crumbled

title: Pesto pizza with aubergine & goat’s cheese
ingredients: ½quantity pizza dough(see Basic pizza dough recipe in 'goes well with', right), divided into 2 balls

title: Tuna, olive & rocket pizzas
ingredients: 145g pack  pizzabase mix (or same weight of bread mix)

title: Blue cheese & pancetta pizza with grilled peaches
ingredients: ½quantity pizza dough(see recipe in 'goes well with', right), divided into 2 balls

title: Florentine dairy-free pizza
ingredients: toppings of your choice- anchovies, olives, capers, pepperoni, artichoke hearts, grilled peppers

title: Brussels & blue cheese pizza
ingredients: ‘00’ flour or use strong bread flour
75gsoft blue cheese, such as Gorgonzola (or vegetarian alternative)

title: Ham, spinach & artichoke pizza pie
ingredients: 6 rounded tbsptomato sauce, passata or pasta sauce from a jar

title: Mini polenta pizza bites
ingredients: optional toppings(for example, chopped pepper, sweetcorn, olives or mushrooms)

title: Pizza rolls
ingredients: 2 balls mozzarella, sliced (we used Sainsbury's Basics)

title: Prosciutto & pepper pizzas
ingredients: 2garlic  flatbreads(we used Waitrose garlic & sundried tomato flatbreads)

title: Bake-from-the-freezer pizzas
ingredients: 250gball mozzarellatorn (dry well with kitchen paper, to keep the base crispy)

title: Florentine pizza
ingredients: 6 rounded tbsptomato saucefrom a jar (we used Loyd Grossman's Tomato and Chilli)
about a third or a 290gjar of antipasti mushrooms

title: Roast cauliflower cheese pizza
ingredients: 1 thin 25cmpizza base, or 2 small pizza bases

title: Turkish pizza with spiced pomegranate beef & feta
Potato & chorizo pizza breads with peppery tomato salad
ingredients: 3medium to large potatoes, very thinly sliced

title: Polenta pizza with purple sprouting broccoli & mozzarella
ingredients: 125gball of low-fat mozzarella, cut into cubes

title: No-cook goat's cheese pizza
ingredients: tub marinated grilled red and yellow peppers

title: Speedy microwave pizza toastie
ingredients: 125gball mozzarella, drained, patted dry and thinly sliced

title: Mushroom & aubergine pizza pie
ingredients: 2 x 125g balls mozzarella, patted dry and sliced

title: Christmas tree pizza tart
ingredients: toppings of your choice (we used pancetta, chopped chipolatas and finely chopped red onion)

title: Lactose-free pizza
ingredients: 50gParmigiano-Reggiano40g finely grated, 10g shaved with a veg peeler

title: Prawn, lemon & fennel pizza
ingredients: ½quantity pizza dough(see Basic pizza dough recipe in 'goes well with', right), divided into 2 balls

title: Tomato sauce for pasta
ingredients: 1 tspvegetable stockpowder or ½ crumbled stock cube

title: Brie & potato pizza
ingredients: 290gpack Sara Lee ready rolled pizza base

title: Spicy pizza breads with raita salad
ingredients: ½ a 500gpack  ciabattaor plain bread mix, plus extra for rolling out (we like Wrights)
1 tbspoil, plus a little extra for oiling

title: Calzone
ingredients: 2 slicesParma ham, torn into bite-sized pieces

title: Flamiche
ingredients: 80gcomté,gruyère or cheddar (use cheddar for vegetarians), grated
